medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started 4 days ago as cramping pain diffusely through the abdomen. He denies fevers, chills, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea. He reports his last bowel movement was 3 days ago and he last passed flatus in the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of SBO, bowel resection in childhood, ileostomy reversal.
